verbose_text: In their seminal publication, Oetjen et al., demonstrated : the receptor for IL-4, IL-4Ra, is directly expressed on sensory neurons in both mice and human dorsal root ganglia; that expression of Th2 cytokines (IL-4, IL-13, and IL-31) directly activates sensory dorsal root ganglia neurons; and that ablation of IL-4Ra abated chronic itching in a murine mouse model [XREF_BIBR, XREF_BIBR].
